description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. QuizCall-Africa 2010 has a plethora of new features including computer  opponents to test you to the max. Gather round and show us who is the  smartest cookie in the jar, with a mix of general knowledge/sports and football questions. Africa 2010 the perfect addition to any World Cup party. See you on the high score table! (Big Button compatible)  It's not a party unless it's a QuizCall party!
